resources.string:
The rules of 5x5 grid Tic Tac Toe are as follows:
 1. The game is played on a 5x5 grid.
 2. Players take turns placing their symbol (X or O) on the grid.
 3. The first player to get 4 of their symbols in a row (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) wins the game.
 4. If all of the spaces on the grid are filled and no player has won, the game is a draw.
